name: Casa nas Serras

reviews.title: A hidden gem
reviews.text: We would highly recommend this B&B. The rooms are nicely decorated, the breakfast is delicious and the view is beautiful. There are a couple of very good restaurants within a few minutes drive and a couple of day excursions with fantastic views. It was such a treat to be off the tourist path after several weeks of traveling to all the hot spots in Europe. It was very calming.

reviews.title: Pristine Oasis
reviews.text: Talented and friendly Frederik and Angelique are a charming couple who have created a pristine oasis in the countryside outside of Coimbra. Just use your GPS-it's a pretty 30 minute drive from and/or the historic treasures of Coimbra! This is a deluxe bed and breakfast at a reasonable price. I really appreciated the tranquil and soothing accommodations, amazing breakfasts, and warm hospitality of this couple.......as did many other reviewers!

reviews.title: Wonderful B&B!
reviews.text: We spent three days at Casa nas Serras and loved this place from the very first moment. It looks just as great as on the website's pictures, and Angelique and Frederik make you feel like being at home. We very much enjoyed the rich breakfast on the terrace with a splendid view into the green mountains, and a swim in the big pool. The room was nicely decorated and the bed was just amazingly comfortable. As the surrounding area offers many things to do (we drove to Coimbra and went canoeing on the Mondego river), Casa nas Serras is a great starting point for excursions. A place to remember and a place to recommend!

reviews.title: Lovely hospitality in casa nas serras
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed two lovely nights on april. It was still cold, but the radiator was more than enough, we had a very clean room and hot waters. Frederick and Angelique are a very nice young european couple with excellent english. They give great recommendations so do consult with them.

reviews.title: Beautiful place to stay
reviews.text: For the first night they advised us to go and eat in a local place where chicken is the specialty of the house, it was one of our best meals in Portugal and also the cheapest one :)

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I just stayed at this excellent b&b and are already making plans to return. We can't express the beauty of the view from our little porch, the gorgeous yard, and exceptional company of Angelique, Frederik and Chopin. Just sitting on the porch for the delicious breakfast we were surrounded by the sounds of birds, children in a nearby playground, and the wind in the trees. Frederik kindly answered our endless questions about the history of the restored house, the well, and the neighbor's shed full of farm animals. Thanks for a great visit!

reviews.title: Excellent B&B
reviews.text: A great place to stay in central Portugal, ideal for exploring Coimbra and the small remote towns of the Beiras.

reviews.title: Wonderful, Relaxing Stay in Modern & Cozy B&B with breathtaking view (everything we imagined Portugal to be!)
reviews.text: The rooms are spotless, modern and tastefully decorated. The pool, garden and outdoor spaces are ideal for relaxing in, with amazing views across the valley. The breakfast is one of the best we've had, and Angelique and Frederik and excellent hosts, full of suggestions of what to see/do and where to eat.

reviews.title: Cozy, friendly, peaceful, and relaxing getaway.
reviews.text: We hope to be back one day!

reviews.title: Excellent feel-at-home B&B in authentic Portugal
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I wanted to get away from rainy Brussels and so booked a 5day getaway to sunny Portugal. The B&B is warm, clean and modern with Moroccan accents and great deck furniture. Unfortunately, it wasn't warm enough to use the pool - but that just means we'll have to come back in the summer!! We couldn't put our camera down. Sitting on the patio in the sunshine we enjoyed our hearty breakfast while breathing in the beautiful scenery. The view is amazing. The countryside rolls in front of you and the sky stretches on. It's such a peaceful way to start the day. The breakfast is plentiful. A choice of fresh fruit, a variety of bread from the local bakery (or if you're even luckier they baked it themselves), cheeses, meat, honey and jam (to die for & yes you can buy some at the duty free on the flight home), yogurt, cereal, hard boiled eggs and on special occasions, pancakes. Beyond delish and seconds aplenty. It's true what others have written. Angelique and Freddy are lovely. Very knowledgeable and full of resources. We showed up having done NO research and they guided us to interesting sites. We went on a day trip to Coimbra (great shopping, cute cafes and a Botanical garden along the river which is perfect to walk off the pastries!), out for dinner at a local restaurant (had the best spiced chicken I've ever had - I'm from Canada - it beats Swiss Chalet ;) and also to this authentic palace nestled in a forest with a great hiking trail and magnificent views (believe it or not we saw a DOUBLE rainbow). When not out sightseeing we were enjoying the room which is cozy and has the most comfortable beds. Slept so well and for hours. We both fell in love with Portugal but my boyfriend has a soft spot for Chopin - one of the cutest, shaggiest dogs ever. A truly wonderful experience. We look forward to returning when it's even hotter and with our friends and family in tow. Hope to see you all again and soon!

reviews.title: Breat!
reviews.text: Very nice B&B, managed by a young Belgian couple. Frederik and Angelique are very nice, and help ful. they advised us some restaurants for the night, excellent food and cheap. So a full recommend for this nice B&B address!

reviews.title: Couldn't be better!
reviews.text: Fantastic B&B! We enjoyed our stay from start to finish: very friendly welcome, clean and beautiful room with comfortable bed, delicious breakfast, excellent location, refreshing pool with amazing view, ... What we loved the most was the warm and helpful approach of the hosts, Angelique and Frederik. They give amazing advice on what to do and where to eat and they really make you feel at home!

reviews.title: GOLD MEDAL
reviews.text: This is by far the best B&B we have ever experienced, we can't wait to go back!

reviews.title: Wonderful B&B
reviews.text: Thank you, Angelique and Frederik, for making our stay so lovely.

reviews.title: wonderful oasis of calm
reviews.text: This stay was not planned. We had spent a 3 days in Lisboa and we were heading back to Porto. We stayed 4 days with our teenagers (16/14) in the B&B of Angelique and Frederique. We enjoyed very much our stay. Nice clean rooms, good breakfast. Very nice pool.

reviews.title: Warmth and hospitality at it's best!
reviews.text: We only regret we had but one night at Angelique and Frederik's wonderful B & B. It is obvious they have taken painstaking care to provide a special stop to kick back and relax.

reviews.title: Amazing sunrise
reviews.text: Quiet and peaceful, Casa nas Serras is located in a local region but within a short distance to see the sites of central Portugal. They have done a beautiful renovation and the rooms are fresh, modern, exceptionally clean and comfortable.

reviews.title: Absolutely INCREDIBLE!
reviews.text: But the true gem is Angelique and Frederik themselves. Friendly and helpful they go out of their way to make your experience a special one. They are even available to help you after your departure (thanks guys!!).

reviews.title: Great place
reviews.text: Thank you for providing a relaxing, albeit brief, respite during our hectic travel schedule.

reviews.title: Nice place, Nice host
reviews.text: Very nice b&b, lovely house with very nice views over the surrounding hills.

description: Casa nas Serras is a bed and breakfast located in central Portugal. Situated just outside of Vila Nova de Poiares, a small town in the middle of nature. In May 2010 renovations were started on this authentic Portuguese country house. It is run by Angelique De Geest and Frederik Buys, a young Belgian couple. Under the Portuguese sun and surrounded by beautiful views, they hope to welcome you at Casa nas Serras. GPS: 40.222025,-8.271641
